page.title: 05HOBBIES
page.content: Hobbies include: dancing, karate, stamps and sticker collecting. {MUSIC:}I play 3rd cornet. I am in the school band & Loxley Methodist Silver Prize Band. I practise over 4 hours a week. With Loxley Band we play in concerts in & out of Sheffield. I also play the bugle at Trinity Church. {FOOTBALL:}I play for Sheffield Rangers & Sheffield Boys. To get in I had to get through 5 trials from 150 people from all over the city. We have a chance of winning 4 medals & have already won 2 cups. {SWIMMING:}We train every night and before school for galas all over the UK. I am one of the 6 fastest in the city & I have been picked to go to Holland in August as an international swimmer. It is not a hobby it is hard work !
